champions.name: Dragonholt, the Dracoborg
champions.effect: Exhaust, pay 1, discard one Fire Unit from your hand: Add one non-Legendary Dragon Unit from your deck to your hand.

champions.name: Raine, Mournful Commander
champions.effect: Exhaust, Expel up to two units from your hand: Deal damage to target unit equal to the number of cards expelled x500.

champions.name: Renna, Feral Warrior
champions.effect:
Exhaust, if you declared an attack with a Fire unit this turn, put the top card of your deck under this card: If it was a Fire unit, you may deal 1000 to target unit your opponent controls.
Put two cards from under this card on the top or bottom of their owner's deck in any order: Put a Dinosaur unit from your hand or discard zone with cost equal to or less than the number of shards you control into play.

champions.name: Jemial, Cryptic Caster
champions.effect:
Place one counter on this card for each Water Unit that comes into play on your field.
Remove three counters from this card: Draw two cards then discard one card.
champions.special: This card is based on AS game developer Jeff Jones!

champions.name: Gillian, the Witch Queen
champions.effect: Exhaust, Reveal any number of spells from your hand: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a spell with cost equal to or less than the number of cards revealed from your hand, add it to your hand.

champions.name: Pengardian Legend, Hanzo
champions.effect:
Whenever a unit your opponent controls becomes Stunned - You may put the top card of your deck under this card. If it was a Penguin unit, you may draw a card.
Once per turn, put two cards from under this card on the top or bottom of their owner's deck in any order: Ignore the effects of target non-destroyed tower this turn.

champions.name: Eitan, Exiled Prince
champions.effect: Once per turn, pay 1 and sacrifice a Unit you control: Put into play one Air Unit from your hand whose cost is 1 greater than the sacrificed Unit.

champions.name: Ariana, Adventurer of Argos
champions.effect: At the start of the game (after mulligans) you may add one "Kala, Trusty Companion" and/or one "Ariana’s Amulet" from your deck to your hand.

champions.name: Hadir, Boy of the Sacred Forest
champions.effect:
Exhaust, put a card from your hand under this card: If it was a Beast unit, you may place a +500 counter on target unit. If it was an Elemental unit, draw a card.
Put two cards form under this card into the discard zone: Target unit you control gets +1000 and gains Overrun this turn.

champions.name: Liam, Traitor of Knights
champions.effect:
When you destroy an opponent's Tower - You can add one Gear from your deck to your hand.
Once per turn, discard one Gear from your hand: target Unit gets +500 this turn.

champions.name: Auron, the Golden Rose
champions.effect: Exhaust, Discard one Knight or Gear from your hand: Exhaust target unit.

champions.name: Zane, Hero of Hyldia
champions.effect:
Exhaust: If you declared an attack with a basic unit this turn, put a card from your hand under this card, and if you do, draw a card.
Put two cards under this card into the discard zone: Put a Hyldian token (Unit/Warrior/Light/1000) into play.

champions.name: Hoenna, Immoral Conjurer
champions.effect:
When you destroy a Tower or Unit in battle - Place one counter on this card.
Remove three counters from this card: Put into play a Golem Token Unit (Unit * Golem/Dark/1500).

champions.name: Ergon, the Tragic Gargoyle
champions.effect:
Exhaust: Send the top two cards of your deck to the discard zone.
Exhaust, Pay (1): Put target unit from your discard zone on top of your deck.

champions.name: Neferia, the Queen's Assassin
champions.effect:
Whenever you trigger the Ruined ability of a unit - You may put that unit under this card.
Exhaust, put three cards from under this card into the discard zone: Target unit loses all abilities this turn. Then if its cost is (3) or less, destroy it.

champions.name: Metaial, the Silver King
champions.faq: FAQ: Metaial's 1st ability is not actually triggered. It should be a static ability.
champions.effect:
Instead of drawing for your turn you may discard a card - If you do, search your deck for a Silver General unit and add it to your hand.
Pay (1), place a Silver General unit from your discard zone on the bottom of your deck: Draw a card.

champions.name: Greatest Gardener, Gregory
champions.effect: Exhaust, sacrifice a unit: Recover one of your shards.

champions.name: Kratin, Being of Strength
champions.effect: Exhaust, pay (2): Target attacking unit gets +1000 this turn.

champions.name: Master of the Cerulean Tower
champions.effect: Exhaust, pay (1): Draw a card, then put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

spirits.name: Corona, the Fire Spirit
spirits.effect:
Once per turn, during your turn, discard one Fire unit from your hand: Deal 500 to target unit.
During your turn, Soulburst: Target unit gains Quickness this turn.

spirits.name: Spirit of Ursatovis
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (2): Target unit gets +1000 this turn, and if its cost is (4) or more it gains Destroyer this turn.
Soulburst: All units you control get +1000 this turn.

spirits.name: Fizzy, the Water Spirit
spirits.effect:
Once per turn, during your turn, Shard Drain 1: Draw one card.
During your turn, Soulburst: Draw one card.

spirits.name: Spirit of Otterius
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (2): Target unit you control gains Unblockable this turn. (Guardian cannot be used when this card attacks.)
Soulburst: Target unit gains Unblockable this turn.

spirits.name: Tux, the Emperor Spirit
spirits.effect:
When a unit you control destroys a tower - You may draw a card then discard a card.
Soulburst, pay (3): Stun all units your opponent controls. (A Stunned card cannot attack, block, or use activated abilities, until the end of the next turn.)

spirits.name: Kyte, the Air Spirit
spirits.effect:
Once per turn, during your turn, discard one card: Return target Air unit you control to its owner's hand and, if you do, switch one of your exhausted shards to active.
Soulburst: Return target unit with cost (3) or less to its owner's hand.

spirits.name: Spirit of Strigra
spirits.effect:
At the start of the game (after mulligans) you may search your shard deck for a shard, shuffle your shard deck, then place it on top.
Soulburst: Recover a shard.

spirits.name: Sola, the Light Spirit
spirits.effect:
At the end of your turn - You can switch one of your exhausted units to active.
Soulburst: Put into play a Knight unit token with Guardian (Unit * Knight/Light/2000).

spirits.name: Spirit of Cervimini
spirits.effect:
At the start of the game (after mulligans) you may search your deck for a Gear with cost (1) and add it to your hand.
Soulburst: Equip target Gear from your discard zone to target unit you control.

spirits.name: Buckeye, the Loyal
spirits.effect:
You start the game with a Hound unit token with Guardian (Unit * Hound/Light/500). This token cannot attack, and has "Sacrifice this unit: Prevent the next damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn."
Soulburst: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target unit this turn.
spirits.special: This card is based on one of Jim's real dogs!

spirits.name: Luna, the Dark Spirit
spirits.effect:
When you destroy a tower or unit in battle - Place one counter on this card.
During your turn, remove three counters from this card: Your opponent discards one card.
During your turn, Soulburst: Your opponent discards one card.

spirits.name: Spirit of Serpio
spirits.effect:
Exhaust: Sacrifice a unit.
Soulburst: All units get -1000 this turn.

spirits.name: Dubell, Spirit of Gains
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (1): Target attacking unit gets +500 this turn.
Soulburst: Target unit gets +1000 this turn.

spirits.name: Chewallo, Spirit of Seeds
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (1): Look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck.
Soulburst: Recover one of your shards.

spirits.name: Welink, Spirit of Paper
spirits.effect:
Exhaust, pay (1): Put the bottom card of your deck on top of your deck.
Soulburst: Draw a card.

towers.name: Tower of Fire
towers.effect: When this card is destroyed, you can destroy a Unit.

towers.name: Tower of Surging Flames
towers.effect:
Use only if your spirit or champion is Fire.
When this card is destroyed: You may deal 1500 to all units your opponent controls. Use this effect only if you have more destroyed towers than your opponent.

towers.name: Tower of Embers
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may deal 1500 to a unit, then you may deal 1000 to a unit.

towers.name: Tower of Water
towers.effect: When this card is destroyed, you can draw two cards.

towers.name: Tower of Surging Torrents
towers.effect:
Use only if your spirit or champion is Water.
When this card is destroyed: You may search your deck for a spell and add it to your hand. Use this effect only if you have more destroyed towers than your opponent.

towers.name: Tower of Waves
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck.

towers.name: Tower of Air
towers.effect: When this card is destroyed, you can return up to two Units from the field to their owner's hand.

towers.name: Tower of Surging Gales
towers.effect:
Use only if your spirit or champion is Air.
When this card is destroyed: You may put the top card of your shard deck into play. Use this effect only if you have more destroyed towers than your opponent.

towers.name: Tower of Gusts
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may recover all shards you control.

towers.name: Tower of Light
towers.effect: When this card is destroyed, you can put into play a Knight Unit Token with Guardian (Unit * Knight/Light/2000).

towers.name: Tower of Surging Radiance
towers.effect:
Use only if your spirit or champion is Light.
When this card is destroyed: You may put a unit with cost (3) or less from your hand into play. Use this effect only if you have more destroyed towers than your opponent.

towers.name: Tower of Glimmers
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may exhaust all units your opponent controls.

towers.name: Tower of Darkness
towers.effect: When this card is destroyed, you can look at your opponent's hand and select one card, then your opponent discards that card.

towers.name: Tower of Surging Shadows
towers.effect:
Use only if your spirit or champion is Dark.
When this tower is destroyed: You may return a unit with cost (3) or less from your discard zone to the field. Use this effect only if you have more destroyed towers than your opponent.

towers.name: Tower of Fear
towers.effect: When this tower is destroyed, you may exhaust two of your opponent's shards.

shards.name: Wyvern Crystal
shards.effect:
If your spirit isn't Fire, this card comes into play exhausted.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Arrive - Add target Dragon unit from your discard zone to your hand, and, if you do, discard one card from your hand.

shards.name: Cryptic Crystal
shards.effect:
If your spirit isn't Water, this card comes into play exhausted.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Arrive - Look at the top two cards of your deck and put them back in any order.

shards.name: Zephyr Crystal
shards.effect:
If your spirit isn't Air, this card comes into play exhausted.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Exhaust, pay (2): Destroy target Augment.

shards.name: Hallowed Crystal
shards.effect:
If your spirit isn't Light, this card comes into play exhausted.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Exhaust, pay (1): Target unit with Guardian gets +500 this turn.

shards.name: Nightmare Crystal
shards.effect:
If your spirit isn't Dark, this card comes into play exhausted.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Exhaust: Send the top card of your deck to the discard zone.

shards.name: Corona, the Spirit Ruby
shards.effect:
If you control another legendary shard send this card to the discard zone.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Exhaust, flip your spirit face-down: Destroy target unit.

shards.name: Fizzy, the Spirit Sapphire
shards.effect:
If you control another legendary shard send this card to the discard zone.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Exhaust, flip your spirit face-down: Draw two cards.

shards.name: Kite, the Spirit Emerald
shards.effect:
If you control another legendary shard send this card to the discard zone.
Exhaust: Produce (1).
Exhaust, flip your spirit face-down: Switch up to two of your shards to active.

alts.effect: Exhaust, pay 1, discard one Fire Unit from your hand: Add one non-Legendary Dragon Unit from your deck to your hand.

beta.name: Hidden Laboratory
beta.effect:
Final Text:
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - Place three counters on your Champion if it is "Hoenna, Immoral Conjurer".
Exhaust, sacrifice a Golem Unit: Draw one card.

beta.name: Failed Golem
beta.effect:
Final Text:
Ruined (When this card is destroyed or sacrificed.) You can send one Golem Unit from your deck to the discard zone.

beta.name: Golem Of Allurement
beta.effect: Arrive - Take control of target unit with cost (1) or less. It cannot attack this turn.

beta.name: Golem Of Arrogance
beta.effect: Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - If you control another Golem Unit, your opponent sacrifices a Unit. Then, if they have more cards in their hand than you, they discard one card.

beta.name: Golem Of Avarice
beta.faq: FAQ: The other golem unit must be in play at the time of this Arrive's resolution
beta.effect: Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - If you control another Golem Unit, discard one random card from your opponent's hand.

beta.name: Golem Of Devourment
beta.faq: FAQ: You may not attack with this card to win the game. The game winning unit must be able to deal damage
beta.effect:
Guardian
This card cannot deal damage.
Ruined - Put a "Golem of Devourment" from your deck into play.

beta.name: Golem Of Indolence
beta.effect:
Target Attack (This Unit can attack any Unit.) This card only attack Units.
Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - You can discard one card. If you do, this turn this card gains +1000 and Quickness (This Unit can attack or activate Exhaust abilities the turn it is played).

beta.name: Golem Of Jealousy
beta.effect: Arrive (When this card enters the field zone.) - If you control another Golem Unit, draw one card.

beta.name: Golem Of Vengeance
beta.effect:
Destroyer (When this card attacks a Tower, it attacks two Towers instead.)
Arrive - Look at your opponent's hand and select one card, then your opponent discards that card. If you control two or more other Golem Units, select two cards instead.

beta.name: Tower of Fire
beta.effect:
Final Text:
When this card is destroyed, you can destroy a Unit.

beta.name: Tower of Water
beta.effect:
Final Text:
When this card is destroyed, you can draw two cards.

beta.name: Tower of Air
beta.effect:
Final Text:
When this card is destroyed, you can return up to two Units from the field to their owner's hand.

beta.name: Tower of Light
beta.effect:
Final Text:
When this card is destroyed, you can put into play a Knight Unit Token with Guardian (Unit * Knight/Light/2000).

beta.name: Tower of Darkness
beta.effect:
Final Text:
When this card is destroyed, you can look at your opponent's hand and select one card, then your opponent discards that card.

beta.effect:
Final Text:
When you destroy an opponent's Tower - You can add one Gear from your deck to your hand.
Once per turn, discard one Gear from your hand: target Unit gets +500 this turn.
